item.title: Forcing systemd initramfs to boot into recovery shell
item.description: I have been trying to debug an initramfs hook that I wrote, which wasnt doing what I wanted it to (namely it did literally nothing at all). Some debugging was in order. I wanted get into the initramfs image environment and see what was going on and what assumptions I have made that turned out to be incorrect.
